amendment.description: Amendment authorizes a new grant program, the Volunteer Generation Fund, to be administered by the Corporation for National and Community Service.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-39 to authorize a new grant program, the Volunteer Generation Fund, to be administered by the Corporation for National and Community Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Loebsack amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 261 - 168 (Roll no. 134).
